question: Many people say smoking should be banned and some say it is not a good idea. What is your opinion on this?
text: Recently,there has been a bad trend among young people about the smoking problem to copy the style of adults. This is essential that people need to concern at the moment due to bad affection of tobacco to our health. Therefore the government and the public should ban all cigar advertising to control this issue.

The more reason why cigarette advertising should be banned that it is not good for health. It contains a large toxic which causes many respiratory diseases such as lung cancer, heart illness,.. Soon. It affects both smokers and passive smokers.

The next reason should ban cigarette advertising that it may lead to a dangerous issue namely drug addiction. One of all components of cigarette is Nicotine which makes people is difficult to quit smoking when you start to use it. Many experts checked and collected the same evidences about this matter.

According to the statistics the number of young people smoking in the eighteen to twenty years old is getting increased by 20% up 70%. Smoking directly impact to teenagers' health. It is a part of decreasing physical and brain development of one, which lead to a decline in academic result.

What do we do to control this mater? Perhaps the best solution to this problem is the education of young people concern the danger of bad habit. Especially, heavy tax should be placed on cigarette advertising so that the teenager would not be able to afford them. The government also should be banned to protect public health and future owners of the country.
